# dithersResult

**Type Property**

An option that causes the filter to dither the result, to reduce banding.

## Declaration

```swift
static var dithersResult: GraphicsContext.BlurOptions { get }
```

## Getting blur options

- **opaque**: An option that causes the filter to ensure the result is completely opaque.

items.description: An option that causes the filter to ensure the result is completely opaque.
